result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John Anthony Lee

records.addlTxt: Criminal warrant cancelled and returned to Clerk of Court office.

Defendant appears, via Zoom, voluntarily on warrant. The matter is continued for scheduling conference set on 12-21-22. Bail is continued with all prior conditions. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs or any controlled substances. 
MTPD contacted to cancel/return warrant.
Minutes.
Contacted MTPD, criminal warrant cancelled and to be returned to Clerk of Court office.
Scheduling conference on December 21, 2022 at 11:10 am.

10:56 AM  Defendant John Anthony Lee not in court.  Attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant fails to appear for the scheduling conference today.  State requests warrant.  Court authorizes warrant.  Any cash bail previously posted will be forfeited unless good cause is given for failure to appear.

11:35 am - Prosecuting attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John Anthony Lee in court.  Counsel waived for today.  Not guilty plea.  Jury calendar.  Bail is set at 100.00 recognizance bond with the condition that he maintain absolute sobriety from controlled substances.  Bail furnished.
Further proceedings scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 10:50 am.

RE:  Possess THC, on 05-12-22.
Initial appearance is set for 07-14-22 at 10:30 a.m. B-15.
